meals.title: Cheeseburger
meals.description: A classic cheeseburger with a juicy beef patty, melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles, all served on a toasted bun.

meals.title: Chicken Nuggets
meals.description: Crispy and tender chicken nuggets made from white meat, served with your choice of dipping sauce.

meals.title: Margherita Pizza
meals.description: A simple yet delicious pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.

meals.title: Fish and Chips
meals.description: Crispy beer-battered fish fillets served with golden-brown French fries and tartar sauce.

meals.title: Caesar Salad
meals.description: A fresh salad made with crisp romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
